times-up.Debug.Name: Debug
times-up.Debug.Hint: Choose the amount of debug to display
times-up.DisablePassiveEffects.Name: Disable Passive Effects on expiry
times-up.DisablePassiveEffects.Hint: Instead of deleting passive effects (created when adding an item/feature/spell) on expiry mark them as disabled. When this option is active, enabling a passive effect will reset its start time/round/turn
